boolean empSinging = sing(emps, song); if (bossIsHappy(emps, empSinging)) { getBossSunshine(emps); raisesGiven(); } getBossSunshine(emps); goF__kYourself(); } public abstract boolean sing(Set<Emp> emps, Song song); public abstract void goF__kYourself(); public void raisesGiven() { throw new RuntimeException("everyone singing tomorrow is better than those oranges"); } public boolean bossIsHappy(Set<Emp> emps, boolean bossSatisfied) { Iterator<Emp> iterator = emps.iterator(); boolean isKneel = true; while (iterator.hasNext()) { Emp emp = iterator.next(); isKneel = isKneel && emp.isKneel(); } return isKneel && bossSatisfied && (new Random().nextInt(100) > 50); } public abstract void getBossSunshine(Set<Emp> emps); public void BossRewardSomething(Emp emp) { System.out.println("Boss reward " + emp.getName() + " someThing"); } private void gatherTogether(Set<Emp> emps) { if (emps == null) { throw new RuntimeException("the big Qing is gone"); } if (emps.size() < 10) { System.out.println("the coward is gone"); } Iterator<Emp> iterator = emps.iterator(); while (iterator.hasNext()) { Emp emp = iterator.next(); emp.checkIn(emp); } } public static void main(String[] args) { Set<Emp> pzs = new HashSet<>(); Song song = new Song(); Emp emp = new Emp(); emp.show(pzs,song); }}class Emp extends YearMeeting { private String name; private boolean kneel; private boolean stomachIssure; void checkIn(Emp emp) { System.out.println(emp.getName() + " draw your big Name"); } @Override public void getBossSunshine(Set<Emp> emps) { System.out.println("Boss reward " + new Emp().getName() + " 200 TrafficCard"); } @Override public void goF__kYourself() { System.out.println("fill your f__king mouth and shut the f__k up"); } @Override public boolean sing(Set<Emp> emps, Song song) { Iterator<Emp> iterator = emps.iterator(); while (iterator.hasNext()){ Emp next = iterator.next(); if(song.isDisgusting()){ next.setStomachIssure(true); iterator.remove(); } } return emps.size()>0; } protected boolean isKneel() { return this.kneel; } protected String getName() { return this.name; } public boolean getStomachIssure() { return false; } public void setStomachIssure(boolean stomachIssure) { this.stomachIssure = stomachIssure; }}class Song { private String name; private boolean disgusting; protected String getName(){ return this.name; } protected boolean isDisgusting(){ return this.disgusting; }}
